abstract: Former Rikers Island prison guard Austin Romain is sentenced to 41 months in prison for smuggling and selling drugs at prison facility.
lead_paragraph: Austin Romain, 33, was convicted last year of smuggling contraband to inmates who sold it to fellow inmates, a scheme in which he was paid $11,000 in bribes.

headline.main: Ex-Rikers Guard Sentenced to Prison for Smuggling and Selling Drugs
headline.print_headline: Ex-Rikers Guard Is Sentenced to Prison

snippet: Austin Romain, 33, was convicted last year of smuggling contraband to inmates who sold it to fellow inmates, a scheme in which he was paid $11,000 in bribes.
